Let's talk

Legal advice with criteria and closeness.

Lawyers specialized in inheritance, commercial, tax and labor law. We accompany companies and families with clear and effective solutions.

Contact

We listen, analyze and act with rigor, offering legal responses that provide security and balance.

We are a law firm that believes in close treatment, clarity and trust. We study each case with rigor and empathy, always seeking the best legal and personal solution for our clients. We work to make law understandable, useful and fair.

OUR TEAM OUR SERVICES

How we work

We listen and understand the situation from the beginning, analyze and plan the best possible strategy, and act with rigor and constant follow-up. Our goal is for the client to feel accompanied, informed and calm at all times.

How we help you

At JF Legal we accompany both companies and families in the key moments of their activity or assets.

We advise entrepreneurs who start their project, companies that need to reorganize or resolve conflicts between partners, and families who seek to plan their inheritance with legal security and tax efficiency.

We also provide continuous support in accounting, tax and labor matters, ensuring regulatory compliance and helping to optimize resources.

Our philosophy We work from transparency, analysis and trust. We don't seek to accumulate clients, but lasting relationships based on results and good treatment. We get personally involved in each case, ensuring that every step has legal and human meaning.

Practice Areas

Especialistas en asesoramiento legal integral para empresas y particulares. Ofrecemos soluciones personalizadas en las áreas de derecho fiscal, laboral, mercantil y sucesiones, adaptadas a las necesidades específicas de cada cliente.

FAQ

Frequently Asked Questions

What services does JF Legal Consulting offer?

We offer specialized services in four main areas: Tax and Accounting (tax management, declarations, inspections), Labor (payroll, dismissals, collective agreements), Commercial and Corporate (company formation, mergers, contracts) and Successions (wills, inheritances, estate planning).

How long do I have to settle the Inheritance Tax?

The Inheritance Tax must be settled and filed within 6 months after the date of death of the deceased, although a 6-month extension can be requested. It is important not to exceed these deadlines to avoid penalties or late payment interest.

What is the Beckham Law and who can apply for it?

The Beckham Law allows foreign workers who move to Spain for work reasons to access more beneficial taxation (24% up to €600,000, 47% from there). It requires having been a tax resident outside Spain for the last 5 years, having an employment contract in Spain and residing more than 183 days a year.

When should I incorporate a company instead of being self-employed?

The decision depends on several factors: if your business has growth prospects, you need partners, you seek asset protection or require greater financial flexibility, a company may be more convenient. We advise you to choose the legal form that best suits your profile and business objectives.

Law firm specialized in tax, labor, commercial and inheritance law. We offer comprehensive legal advice with over 15 years of experience.
